imdb.plot outline: "Behind the Scenes of Kathryn Davis - Take 2" is a video short highlighting portions of the pilot episode of "Kathryn Davis - Take 2," a pilot for consideration for a prime time TV series. The TV series is created and written by, Marneen Fields who also stars in the LEAD role of actress-singer Kathryn Davis. The pilot episode of the series has received a Producers Choice Nomination from the LA Comedy Awards, and to date the title track to the sitcom has won, Most Inspirational Song - The Best of Las Vegas from the Las Vegas Fame Awards, and Most Inspirational Song - The Best of Hollywood from the Hollywood Fame Awards. The comedy is based on her life today as a middle-aged actress and pop-rock singer in Hollywood.

plot: Highlighting portions of the pilot episode of "Kathryn Davis - Take 2." A comedy based on Marneen Fields life today as a middle-aged actress and Pop singer in Hollywood.::Marneen Lynne Fields

"Behind the Scenes of Kathryn Davis - Take 2" is a video short highlighting portions of the pilot episode of "Kathryn Davis - Take 2," a pilot for consideration for a prime time TV series. The TV series is created and written by, Marneen Fields who also stars in the LEAD role of actress-singer Kathryn Davis. The pilot episode of the series has received a Producers Choice Nomination from the LA Comedy _Awards_ (qv), and to date the title track to the sitcom has won, Most Inspirational Song - The Best of Las Vegas from the Las Vegas Fame _Awards_ (qv), and Most Inspirational Song - The Best of Hollywood from the Hollywood Fame _Awards_ (qv). The comedy is based on her life today as a middle-aged actress and pop-rock singer in Hollywood.::Marneen Lynne Fields
